CanvasRenderer Class

Defined in: src/pixi/renderers/canvas/CanvasRenderer.js:5
Module: PIXI

the CanvasRenderer draws the stage and all its content onto a 2d canvas. This renderer should be used for browsers that do not support webGL. Dont forget to add the view to your DOM or you will not see anything :)

Constructor

CanvasRenderer

(
  • width=0
  • height=0
  • view
  • transparent=false
)

Defined in src/pixi/renderers/canvas/CanvasRenderer.js:5

Parameters:

  • width=0 Number

    the width of the canvas view

  • height=0 Number

    the height of the canvas view

  • view Canvas

    the canvas to use as a view, optional

  • transparent=false Boolean

    the transparency of the render view, default false

  • Methods

Defined in src/pixi/renderers/canvas/CanvasRenderer.js:192

Defined in src/pixi/renderers/canvas/CanvasRenderer.js:97
